hero.description: Transform your energy management with AI-driven insights. Reduce costs by up to 40% while contributing to a sustainable future.

about.title: Revolutionizing Energy Management with AI
about.description1: Keico Plus is at the forefront of smart energy solutions, combining cutting-edge AI technology with IoT connectivity to help businesses and organizations optimize their energy consumption.
about.description2: Our platform provides real-time insights, automated controls, and predictive analytics that empower you to make smarter energy decisions while reducing costs and environmental impact.

services.title: Comprehensive Energy Solutions
services.description: Discover our suite of AI-powered tools designed to optimize your energy consumption and reduce operational costs.

service1.title: AI-Powered Analytics
service1.description: Advanced machine learning algorithms analyze your energy patterns to identify optimization opportunities and predict future consumption.

service2.title: Real-Time Monitoring
service2.description: Monitor your entire energy infrastructure in real-time with intuitive dashboards and instant alerts for anomalies.

service3.title: Smart Device Control
service3.description: Seamlessly integrate and control all your IoT devices from a single platform with automated scheduling and optimization.

service4.title: Energy Optimization
service4.description: Automatically optimize energy usage across your facilities with AI-driven recommendations and automated controls.

service5.title: Predictive Maintenance
service5.description: Prevent equipment failures and reduce downtime with AI-powered predictive maintenance alerts and insights.

howItWorks.title: Simple Steps to Smart Energy
howItWorks.description: Get started with Keico Plus in four easy steps and begin your journey to smarter, more efficient energy management.

step1.title: Connect Devices
step1.description: Easily integrate your IoT sensors and smart devices with our platform.

step2.title: Monitor Usage
step2.description: Track energy consumption in real-time across all connected systems.

step3.title: AI Analysis
step3.description: Our AI analyzes patterns and identifies optimization opportunities.

step4.title: Save Energy
step4.description: Implement recommendations and watch your energy costs decrease.

stats.title: Numbers That Speak
stats.description: See the real-world impact of our energy management solutions across industries worldwide.

caseStudies.title: Success Stories
caseStudies.description: Discover how leading organizations have transformed their energy management with Keico Plus.

case1.title: Smart Office Building Reduces Energy by 40%
case1.description: A 50-story office complex in Seoul implemented Keico Plus to optimize HVAC and lighting systems, achieving significant cost savings.

case2.title: Manufacturing Plant Achieves Net Zero
case2.description: Leading electronics manufacturer integrated IoT sensors across production lines to monitor and optimize energy consumption.

case3.title: Smart City Initiative Powers 10,000 Homes
case3.description: Municipal government deployed Keico Plus across residential areas to create an intelligent energy grid with real-time optimization.

cta.description: Join hundreds of businesses already saving energy and reducing costs with Keico Plus. Schedule a demo today and see the difference.

footer.description: AI-powered IoT energy management platform helping businesses reduce costs and environmental impact through intelligent automation.

executiveIntro.subtitle: Meet the leadership team driving KEICO PLUS towards innovation and excellence.

mission.title: Mission
mission.mainText: We lead towards a brighter future through positive impact.
mission.description: We go beyond the conventional energy paradigm to innovate the world's energy, illuminating brightness and hope everywhere. This innovative change lays the foundation for individuals and communities to lead better lives, preserve the environment, and achieve economic prosperity.
items: Creation of new concept value for customers
Improvement of customer quality of life and contribution to public interest
Formation of a smart business system
Realization of the ideology of Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: New Energy Experience - We transcend conventional energy usage methods, ushering in a new era of energy experience for individuals and society.
items: Company contributing to social value creation and future business
Company leading change with challenge and passion

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.subtitle: These are the principles and standards that all members of KEICO PLUS pursue to achieve our mission and vision.

values.title: Creativity
values.subtitle: 創意
values.description: Think innovatively to change paradigms. We strive for continuous innovation, constantly seeking new ideas and solutions beyond traditional thinking.

values.title: Innovation
values.subtitle: 革新
values.description: Create new value by shedding old practices. Innovation is akin to 'putting on new skin.' We discard outdated customs and methods, embracing creative thinking and technology to don the skin of new possibilities.

values.title: Responsibility
values.subtitle: 責任
values.description: Put heart into every decision and action. Responsibility is our commitment to every action and decision. From the beginning to the completion of every project, we take responsibility for the process and results.

values.title: Respect
values.subtitle: 尊重
values.description: Accept and respect each other's differences. Respect leads our work through accepting each other's differences and showing deep reverence for colleagues, customers, and the world.

values.title: Sustainability
values.subtitle: 지속가능성
values.description: Low-carbon, eco-friendly innovative technology. Expansion of climate technology investment and smart energy cooperation system to contribute to building a carbon-neutral circular society.
